pages.text: The $(item)Atomic Reshaper$() can transform materials into other using varying amounts of $(item)Primordium$(). Most notably, it can turn Stone into random raw ores.$(br)Just like the $(item)Primordialis Reactor$() it requires the heat of an $(item)Energion Aeroheater$().$(br2)Items can be inserted/extracted from all sides except the top and bottom.
